Play:
The Amorous Courier on the Yamato Highway
(Koibikyaku Yamato ōrai / 恋飛脚大和往来)

Written By: Suga Sensuke (菅専助) , Wakatake Fuemi (若竹笛躬)

First Staged: 1773

Reference: Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Bunraku October 1971 Performance Program

1/1 – Click image to view.

Performances:

October 1971: The Amorous Courier on the Yamato Highway

June 1974: The Amorous Courier on the Yamato Highway

Characters:

Dengababa (Dengababa / 伝が婆)

Doan (Haritate no Dōan / 針立の道庵)

Magoemon (Oya Magoemon / 親孫右衛門)

Tojibei (Tsurukake no Tōjibei / 弦掛の藤治兵衛)

Chief of a police squad (Torite kogashira / 捕手小頭)

Okizukin (Okizukin / 置頭巾)

Mizuemon (Hinokuchi no Mizuemon / 樋の口の水右衛門)

Umegawa (Umegawa / 梅川)

Chubei (Kameya Chūbei / 亀屋忠兵衛)

Chuzaburo's wife (Chuza's wife) (Chūza nyōbō / 忠三女房)

Hachiemon (Hachiemon / 八右衛門)

Street performers (Sekizoro / 節季候)

Secondhand goods dealer (Furutekai / 古手買)
